meanings.definition: Outdo in terms of hustle or work ethic.
meanings.sent1: She outhustles her classmates by always working hard.
meanings.sent2: He consistently outhustles his competitors in the business world.
meanings.sent3: The little ant outhustles the lazy grasshopper in the fable.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outhustles any obstacle in her path.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's drive to win outhustles all others on the field.

meanings.definition: To surpass in effort or determination.
meanings.sent1: The young entrepreneur outhustles his older competitors with his energy.
meanings.sent2: She always outhustles herself to achieve new goals.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outhustles the other animals to gather the most nuts.
meanings.sent4: His passion for success outhustles any doubts that come his way.
meanings.sent5: The team's unity and hard work outhustles their opponents in every game.
